scripts.build: npm run build:types && npm run build:wp
scripts.build:wp: npm run clear:ts && webpack --config webpack.config.cjs --env production
scripts.build:types: ../../../lib/start.js generate Gtk-3.0 Pango-1.0 WebKit2-4.0 -e node --moduleType esm --useNamespace
scripts.clear: npm run clear:ts && npm run clear:types
scripts.start: npm run clear && npm run build && npm run start:node
